name: Faith
description: Faith is a second year undergraduate studying computer science in Sixth College. Her favorite animals are cheetahs or dogs. She loves to dance and also has a twin sister at UCSD!

name: Henry
description: Henry is a 2nd year studying CS in Sixth College. His favorite animal is the lion and a fun fact is that his middle name is his favorite animal.

name: Chay
description: Chay is a designer with a keen interest in exploring the worlds of Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, and web design. Currently in her 4th year of studying Computer Science, she is excited about merging technology and creativity to craft engaging experiences across various platforms, including the web.

name: Jiaen
description: Jiaen Yu, second year graduate student of CSE department. Cat person, Coconut water lover, Soccer fan and amateur football player.

name: Chris
description: Chris Tian is a second-year CS major. His favorite animal is the cheetah because it is the fastest animal on earth and he is impressed by its hunting ability. He's a pretty adventurous guy but afraid of the feeling of weightlessness such as bungee jumping and riding roller coasters.

name: Mico
description: Mico Guinto; Computer Engineering; Emperor Penguin; His go to In-N-Out order is 2 4x4s Animal Style, extra tomatoes, no pickles, cut in half, banana peppers

name: Nick
description: Nick is a fourth year bioinformatics major at UCSD. His favorite animal is the peacock. He enjoys being out in nature and playing board games with his friends from church. Although he does not endorse the practice of palm reading, he has enjoyed learning about software engineering in CSE 110.

name: Michael
description: Michael is a second year Computer Science major from ERC. His favorite animal is the brown bear and he has visited over 20 countries so far.

name: Anh
description: Greetings, Anh from Revelle College at UCSD. He is a Computer Science major student who hates math (not your typical Asian ðŸ˜¬...) but loves coding and creating amazing things with technology. Probably he can rap in three languages.ðŸŽ¤

name: Dylan
description: Dylan is a third-year CS major in muir college. His favorite animal is a dog because they are man's best friend. His hobbies outside of school related things are playing volleyball and going to the gym.
